                         int which)
                  throws InvalidTargetException,
                         NoOwnerException
        fire the optional effects of this weapon
        Specified by:
        fireOptional in class Weapon
        Parameters:
        target - are the targets of the fire
        which - which optional effect is going to be apply
        Throws:
        InvalidTargetException - if at least one of the targets is invalid
        NoOwnerException - when in at least one of the targets there is not the owner or owner position
